title: Linux tar Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the tar command in Linux, learn to create and extract archives, and compress and decompress data with practical examples.

meta.description: Explore the tar command in Linux, learn to create and extract archives, and compress and decompress data with practical examples.
meta.keywords: tar, Linux, compression, archiving, file management, backup, extraction
